title: Incorrect DSA `key_size` attribute description
body:
## Overview

The documentation for the `DSAPublicKey` and `DSAPrivateKey` (`hazmat/primitives/asymmetric/dsa`) currently (`45.0.3`) has an incorrect description of the `key_size` attribute.

- [dsa.DSAPublicKey](https://cryptography.io/en/45.0.3/hazmat/primitives/asymmetric/dsa/#cryptography.hazmat.primitives.asymmetric.dsa.DSAPublicKey)
- [dsa.DSAPrivateKey](https://cryptography.io/en/45.0.3/hazmat/primitives/asymmetric/dsa/#cryptography.hazmat.primitives.asymmetric.dsa.DSAPrivateKey)

Instead of the incorrect `q` (subgroup order), must be `p` (prime modulus).


## Description in documentation: Incorrect

### DSAPublicKey

```rst
.. class:: DSAPublicKey

	.. versionadded:: 0.3

	A `DSA`_ public key.

	.. attribute:: key_size

		:type: int

		The bit length of :attr:`~DSAParameterNumbers.q`.
```

Correct attribute description must be:

```rst
The bit length of :attr:`~DSAParameterNumbers.p`.
```

Source:

- [dsa.rst#L350](https://github.com/pyca/cryptography/blob/247c09cc5777ee1ff5fe2a86cfe62ef328d45b2e/docs/hazmat/primitives/asymmetric/dsa.rst?plain=1#L350)


### DSAPrivateKey

```rst
.. class:: DSAPrivateKey

	.. versionadded:: 0.3

	A `DSA`_ private key.

	.. attribute:: key_size

		:type: int

		The bit length of :attr:`~DSAParameterNumbers.q`.
```

Correct attribute description must be:

```rst
The bit length of :attr:`~DSAParameterNumbers.p`.
```

Source:

- [dsa.rst#L280](https://github.com/pyca/cryptography/blob/247c09cc5777ee1ff5fe2a86cfe62ef328d45b2e/docs/hazmat/primitives/asymmetric/dsa.rst?plain=1#L280)


## Description in Python code: OK

```py
class DSAPublicKey(metaclass=abc.ABCMeta):
	@property
	@abc.abstractmethod
	def key_size(self) -> int:
		"""
		The bit length of the prime modulus.
		"""
```

Source:
- [dsa.py#L97](https://github.com/pyca/cryptography/blob/247c09cc5777ee1ff5fe2a86cfe62ef328d45b2e/src/cryptography/hazmat/primitives/asymmetric/dsa.py#L97)


## Description in Rust code: OK

```rust
fn key_size(&self) -> i32 {
	self.pkey.dsa().unwrap().p().num_bits()
}
```

Source:
- [dsa.rs#L91](https://github.com/pyca/cryptography/blob/247c09cc5777ee1ff5fe2a86cfe62ef328d45b2e/src/rust/src/backend/dsa.rs#L91)


## Conclusion

The incorrect description of the `key_size` attribute currently exists only in the documentation.

Documentation must be fixed: instead of the incorrect `q` (subgroup order), must be `p` (prime modulus).

Correct attribute description must be:

```rst
	.. attribute:: key_size

		:type: int

		The bit length of :attr:`~DSAParameterNumbers.p`.
```
